00029 #include "CAudio.h"
00030 
00031 // Miles sound library has some level 4 warnings
00032 #pragma warning( push, 3 )
00033 #include "..\Libs\mss.h"
00034 #pragma warning( pop )
00035 
00036 class CMilesAudioBuffer : public CAudioBuffer
00037 {
00038 protected:
00039         HSAMPLE m_Sample;
00040 
00041         // Plays .wav and .mp3 sounds at the right volume (0 to 100)
00042         bool PlayWave(int volume, bool looping);
00043 
00044 public:
00045         CMilesAudioBuffer(HSAMPLE sample, shared_ptr<CSoundResource> resource) 
00046                 : CAudioBuffer(resource) { m_Sample = sample;  }
00047         virtual void *VGet() { return m_Sample; }
00048         virtual bool VRestore() { return true; }
00049 
00050         virtual bool VPlay(int volume, bool looping);
00051         virtual bool VStop();
00052         virtual bool VResume();
00053 
00054         virtual bool VTogglePause();
00055         virtual bool VIsPlaying();
00056         virtual void VSetVolume(int volume);
00057         virtual float VGetProgress() { return 0.0f; }
00058 
00059 };
00060 
00061 class CMilesAudio : public CAudio
00062 {
00063 public:
00064         CMilesAudio();
00065 
00066         virtual bool VActive() { return digDriverHandle!=NULL && !m_AllPaused; }
00067 
00068         virtual IAudioBuffer *VInitAudioBuffer(shared_ptr<CSoundResource> soundResource);
00069         virtual void VReleaseAudioBuffer(IAudioBuffer* audioBuffer);
00070 
00071         virtual void VStopAllSounds();
00072 
00073         virtual void VShutdown();
00074 
00075 public: 
00076 
00077         static bool g_TellBinkToUseDirectSound;                 // governs a Bink API call. Default==true.
00078 
00079 private:
00080         void Initialize();
00081 
00082         HDIGDRIVER digDriverHandle;
00083 
00084         void FAR *DLSData;
00085 
00086         HDLSDEVICE DLSDev;
00087         HDLSFILEID DLSFile;
00088 
00089         S32 digitalRate;
00090         S32 digitalBits;
00091         S32 digitalChans;
00092 
00093         // Initializes the wave driver
00094         void InitializeWaveDriver();
00095 
00096 };
